items.title: Milestone Packages
items.description: All Packages Include: 5 Hour Event Time Inclusive of Ceremony, Two Hour Access Window Prior to Event Start, Served Champagne & Sparkling Cider Toast, Customized Room Setup, Choice of White or Ivory Linens for all Tables, Selection of Napkin Color(s), All China, Glassware & Flatware, Complimentary Parking for all Guests, and Unformed, Professional Staff_._
